package.name: clamwrapper
package.unpack: if [ -f ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 ] ; then tar xjf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 else tar xzf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.gz fi
package.install: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} mkdir -m 0755 /opt/bin mkdir -m 0755 /opt/sbin install -m 0755 clam_wrapper /opt/bin/ install -m 0755 clam_terminal /opt/bin/ install -m 0755 clam_update /opt/sbin/ install -m 0755 /usr/bin/Terminal /opt/bin/ install -m 0755 /usr/bin/zenity /opt/bin/ install -m 4755 /usr/bin/sudo /bin/
